name: Class ElementFilter
text:
Filters for selecting just the elements of interest from a
 collection of elements.  The returned sets and lists are new
 collections and do use the argument as a backing store.  The
 methods in this class do not make any attempts to guard against
 concurrent modifications of the arguments.  The returned sets and
 lists are mutable but unsafe for concurrent access.  A returned set
 has the same iteration order as the argument set to a method.

 If iterables and sets containing null are passed as
 arguments to methods in this class, a NullPointerException
 will be thrown.

methods.method_sig: public static List<VariableElement> fieldsIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of fields in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<VariableElement> fieldsIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of fields in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ExecutableElement> constructorsIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of constructors in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<ExecutableElement> constructorsIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of constructors in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ExecutableElement> methodsIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of methods in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<ExecutableElement> methodsIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of methods in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<TypeElement> typesIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of types in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<TypeElement> typesIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of types in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<PackageElement> packagesIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of packages in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<PackageElement> packagesIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of packages in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement> modulesIn (Iterable<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a list of modules in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static Set<ModuleElement> modulesIn (Set<? extends Element> elements)
methods.description: Returns a set of modules in elements.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement.ExportsDirective> exportsIn (Iterable<? extends ModuleElement.Directive> directives)
methods.description: Returns a list of exports directives in directives.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement.OpensDirective> opensIn (Iterable<? extends ModuleElement.Directive> directives)
methods.description: Returns a list of opens directives in directives.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement.ProvidesDirective> providesIn (Iterable<? extends ModuleElement.Directive> directives)
methods.description: Returns a list of provides directives in directives.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement.RequiresDirective> requiresIn (Iterable<? extends ModuleElement.Directive> directives)
methods.description: Returns a list of requires directives in directives.

methods.method_sig: public static List<ModuleElement.UsesDirective> usesIn (Iterable<? extends ModuleElement.Directive> directives)
methods.description: Returns a list of uses directives in directives.
